items.title: User Activity Sharing
items.description: Enable users to share their workout activities with friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: User can post a completed workout to their social feed
Friends can view shared workouts in their feed
Shared posts display workout type, duration, and basic stats
non_functional: Posts should load in under 2 seconds

items.title: Friends and Followers System
items.description: Allow users to connect with others by adding friends or following them.
acceptance_criteria: User can send and accept friend requests
User can follow another user without mutual confirmation
Friend and follower lists are viewable in the profile
non_functional: Friend/follower actions should be processed in under 1 second

notes: The requirement is broad; assumptions made include that social features will include activity sharing and friend/follower functionality. Additional features like comments, likes, or leaderboards may be considered in future iterations.
